successes.title: Whiskey Elements: Customize your Whiskey in 24 hours
successes.description: Customize your whiskey in 24hrs. It's your whiskey, drink it the way you want. "Accelerated transpiration through capillary action."

Pledges.description: THANK YOU package including Time & Oak stickers and a thank you card signed by the team.
EARLY BIRD - a pair of our signature flavor elements and a thank you pack.
WHISKEY ELEMENTS - a pair of our signature flavor elements and a thank you pack.
STICKS AND STONES - a pair of signature flavor Whiskey Elements and a set of Whiskey Stones ice cubes.
INTERNATIONAL PACKAGE - two pairs (4 Elements) of our signature flavor Elements and a thank you pack!
HOLIDAY KIT - One pair of Whiskey Elements for yourself and two pairs for your whiskey loving friends. Delivered to you before Christmas!
INTERNATIONAL HOLIDAY KIT - One pair of Whiskey Elements for yourself and two pairs for your whiskey loving friends. Delivered to you before Christmas!

REWARDS AS YOU GO -  HOLIDAY KITS. Many people have been asking how to bundle their rewards with their friend's OR how they can select more than one set of Elements. Select this package and your rewards will reflect your pledge amount so that we understand how many Holiday Kits you're wanting to receive. As listed above, Holiday Kits are $25 and contain three pairs (2) of Elements (6 Elements per Kit).
$75-3 Holiday Kits, 
$125-5 Holiday Kits, 
$250-10 Holiday Kits,
$500-20 Holiday Kits,
*This is not a discount, we simply want to better serve our backers.

HOLIDAY + SCOTCH COMBO - three pairs of our signature flavor Whiskey Elements, and 3 pairs of SCOTCH ELEMENTS (beta). We would love to get your feedback; let us know what flavors are your favorites and we will feature your testimonial on our website. The SCOTCH ELEMENTS have a mellowing effect and a slightly smoky flavor.

BETA KIT - three sets of our signature flavor Whiskey Elements and ANOTHER 3 sets of new flavors that will not be released to the public until spring 2015. We would love to get your feedback; let us know what flavors are your favorites and we will feature your testimonial on our website.

INTERNATIONAL BETA KIT - three sets of our signature flavor Whiskey Elements and ANOTHER 3 sets of new flavors that will not be released to the public until spring 2015. We would love to get your feedback; let us know what flavors are your favorites and we will feature your testimonial on our website.

REWARDS AS YOU GO - BETA KITS. Many people have been asking how to bundle their rewards with their friend's OR how they can select more than one set of Elements. Select this package and your rewards will reflect your pledge amount so that we understand how many BETA KITS you're wanting to receive. As listed above, BETA Kits are $54 and contain three pairs (2) of Signature Elements (6 per Kit) and three pairs (2) of BETA flavors (6 per kit) for a total of 12 Elements per BETA Kit.  $163-3 BETA Kits, $270-5 BETA Kits, $540-10 BETA Kits, $1,080-20 BETA Kits. *This is not a discount, we simply want to better serve our backers.
EXECUTIVE KIT - Holiday Kit, Cherry Oak premium wooden Time & Oak pen, stationary, and t-shirt.

BETA + SCOTCH COMBO - three pairs of our signature flavor Whiskey Elements, 3 pairs of new beta flavors that otherwise will not be released to the public until spring 2015, and 3 pairs of SCOTCH ELEMENTS (beta). We would love to get your feedback; let us know what flavors are your favorites and we will feature your testimonial on our website. The SCOTCH ELEMENTS have a mellowing effect and a slightly smoky flavor.
LIMITED EDITION WOOD BRAND BOX - T&O engraved whiskey glass, a beautiful decanter set, and two SPECIAL EDITION Whiskey Elements. This box is beautiful and all laser engraved here in Portland OR.

GENTLEMEN'S SURVIVAL KIT - includes a flask, 6 whiskey elements, 2 scotch elements, Hatchet/Axe, zippo lighter, two LIMITED EDITION engraved whiskey glasses, two LIMITED EDITION engraved shot glasses, and a surprise gift.

FOUNDERS WEEKEND (+1) - Stay at the world-famous Edgefield McMenamins in Portland Oregon, hang with the team for a weekend of private whiskey tastings, dinner, a tour of the facilities, and a spot in the next commercial video. This package is for 2 people.
We are a fun and very entertaining bunch of guys and we would love to hang out with you and show you what we're working so hard for.

FOUNDERS WEEKEND (+3) - Stay at the world-famous Edgefield McMenamins in Portland Oregon, hang with the team for a weekend of private whiskey tastings, dinner, a tour of the facilities, and a spot in the next commercial video. This package is for 4 people.
We are a fun and very entertaining bunch of guys and we would love to hang out with you and show you what we're working so hard for.
